verses.verse: Now Joshua <WH3091> was old <WH2204> and well advanced <WH935> in years. <WH3117> Yahweh <WH3068> said <WH559> to him, <WH2204> "You are old and advanced <WH935> in years, <WH3117> and there remains <WH7604> yet very <WH3966> much <WH7235> land <WH776> to be possessed. <WH3423>
"This is the land <WH776> that still remains: <WH7604> all the regions <WH1552> of the Philistines, <WH6430> and all the Geshurites; <WH1651>

from the Shihor, <WH7883> which is before <WH6440> Egypt, <WH4714> even to the border <WH1366> of Ekron <WH6138> northward, <WH6828> which is counted <WH2803> as Canaanite; <WH3669> the five <WH2568> lords <WH5633> of the Philistines; <WH6430> the Gazites, <WH5841> and the Ashdodites, <WH796> the Ashkelonites, <WH832> the Gittites, <WH1663> and the Ekronites; <WH6139> also the Avvim, <WH5761>
on the south; <WH8486> all the land <WH776> of the Canaanites, <WH3669> and Mearah <WH4632> that belongs to the Sidonians, <WH6722> to Aphek, <WH663> to the border <WH1366> of the Amorites; <WH567>

and the land <WH776> of the Gebalites, <WH1382> and all Lebanon, <WH3844> toward the sunrise, <WH4217> from Baal Gad <WH1171> under Mount <WH2022> Hermon <WH2768> to the entrance <WH935> of Hamath; <WH2574>

all the inhabitants <WH3427> of the hill country <WH2022> from Lebanon <WH3844> to Misrephoth Maim, <WH4956> even all the Sidonians; <WH6722> them will I drive out <WH3423> from before <WH6440> the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478> only allocate <WH5307> it to Israel <WH3478> for an inheritance, <WH5159> as I have commanded you. <WH6680>
Now therefore divide <WH2505> this land <WH776> for an inheritance <WH5159> to the nine <WH8672> tribes <WH7626> and the <WH2677> half-tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh. <WH4519>"

With him the Reubenites <WH7206> and the Gadites <WH1425> received <WH3947> their inheritance, <WH5159> which Moses <WH4872> gave <WH5414> them, <WH5676> beyond the Jordan <WH3383> eastward, <WH4217> even as Moses <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of Yahweh <WH3068> gave them: <WH5414>

from Aroer, <WH6177> that is on the edge <WH8193> of the valley <WH5158> of the Arnon, <WH769> and the city <WH5892> that is in the middle <WH8432> of the valley, <WH5158> and all the plain <WH4334> of Medeba <WH4311> to Dibon; <WH1769>
and all the cities <WH5892> of Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites, <WH567> who reigned <WH4427> in Heshbon, <WH2809> to the border <WH1366> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon; <WH5983>
and Gilead, <WH1568> and the border <WH1366> of the Geshurites <WH1651> and Maacathites, <WH4602> and all Mount <WH2022> Hermon, <WH2768> and all Bashan <WH1316> to Salecah; <WH5548>

all the kingdom <WH4468> of Og <WH5747> in Bashan, <WH1316> who reigned <WH4427> in Ashtaroth <WH6252> and in Edrei <WH154> (the same was left <WH7604> of the remnant <WH3499> of the Rephaim <WH7497>); for Moses <WH4872> attacked <WH5221> these, <WH3423> and drove them out.

Nevertheless the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> didn't <WH3423> drive out the Geshurites, <WH1651> nor the Maacathites: <WH4602> but Geshur <WH1651> and Maacath <WH4602> dwell <WH3427> in the midst <WH7130> of Israel <WH3478> to this day. <WH3117>

Only he gave <WH5414> no inheritance <WH5159> to the tribe <WH7626> of Levi. <WH3878> The offerings <WH801> of Yahweh, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> made by fire <WH801> are his inheritance, <WH5159> as he spoke to him. <WH1696>
Moses <WH4872> gave <WH5414> to the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205> according to their families. <WH4940>

Their border <WH1366> was from Aroer, <WH6177> that is on the edge <WH8193> of the valley <WH5158> of the Arnon, <WH769> and the city <WH5892> that is in the middle <WH8432> of the valley, <WH5158> and all the plain <WH4334> by Medeba; <WH4311>
Heshbon, <WH2809> and all its cities <WH5892> that are in the plain; <WH4334> Dibon, <WH1769> Bamoth Baal, <WH1120> Beth Baal Meon, <WH1010>
Jahaz, <WH3096> Kedemoth, <WH6932> Mephaath, <WH4158>
Kiriathaim, <WH7156> Sibmah, <WH7643> Zereth Shahar <WH6890> in the mount <WH2022> of the valley, <WH6010>
Beth Peor, <WH1047> the slopes of Pisgah, <WH798> Beth Jeshimoth, <WH1020>

all the cities <WH5892> of the plain, <WH4334> and all the kingdom <WH4468> of Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites, <WH567> who reigned <WH4427> in Heshbon, <WH2809> whom Moses <WH4872> struck <WH5221> with the chiefs <WH5387> of Midian, <WH4080> Evi, <WH189> Rekem, <WH7552> Zur, <WH6698> Hur, <WH2354> and Reba, <WH7254> the princes <WH5257> of Sihon, <WH5511> who lived <WH3427> in the land. <WH776>

The children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> alse killed <WH2026> Balaam <WH1109> also the son <WH1121> of Beor, <WH1160> the soothsayer, <WH7080> with the sword, <WH2719> among the rest <WH413> of their slain. <WH2491>

The border <WH1366> of the children <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205> was the bank <WH1366> of the Jordan. <WH3383> This was the inheritance <WH5159> of the children <WH1121> of Reuben <WH7205> according to their families, <WH4940> the cities <WH5892> and its villages. <WH2691>
Moses <WH4872> gave <WH5414> to the tribe <WH4294> of Gad, <WH1410> to the children <WH1121> of Gad, <WH1410> according to their families. <WH4940>

Their border <WH1366> was Jazer, <WH3270> and all the cities <WH5892> of Gilead, <WH1568> and half <WH2677> the land <WH776> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon, <WH5983> to Aroer <WH6177> that is before <WH6440> Rabbah; <WH7237>
and from Heshbon <WH2809> to Ramath Mizpeh, <WH7434> and Betonim; <WH993> and from Mahanaim <WH4266> to the border <WH1366> of Debir; <WH1688>

and in the valley, <WH6010> Beth Haram, <WH1027> Beth Nimrah, <WH1039> Succoth, <WH5523> and Zaphon, <WH6829> the rest <WH3499> of the kingdom <WH4468> of Sihon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of Heshbon, <WH2809> the Jordan <WH3383>'s bank, <WH1366> to the uttermost <WH7097> part of the sea <WH3220> of Chinnereth <WH3672> beyond <WH5676> the Jordan <WH3383> eastward. <WH4217>
This is the inheritance <WH5159> of the children <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> according to their families, <WH4940> the cities <WH5892> and its villages. <WH2691>

Moses <WH4872> gave <WH5414> an inheritance to the <WH2677> half-tribe <WH7626> of Manasseh. <WH4519> It was for the <WH2677> half-tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Manasseh <WH4519> according to their families. <WH4940>

Their border <WH1366> was from Mahanaim, <WH4266> all Bashan, <WH1316> all the kingdom <WH4468> of Og <WH5747> king <WH4428> of Bashan, <WH1316> and all the towns <WH2333> of Jair, <WH2971> which are in Bashan, <WH1316> sixty <WH8346> cities. <WH5892>

Half <WH2677> Gilead, <WH1568> Ashtaroth, <WH6252> and Edrei, <WH154> the cities <WH5892> of the kingdom <WH4468> of Og <WH5747> in Bashan, <WH1316> were for the children <WH1121> of Machir <WH4353> the son <WH1121> of Manasseh, <WH4519> even for the half <WH2677> of the children <WH1121> of Machir <WH4353> according to their families. <WH4940>
These are the inheritances <WH5157> which Moses <WH4872> distributed in the plains <WH6160> of Moab, <WH4124> beyond <WH5676> the Jordan <WH3383> at Jericho, <WH3405> eastward. <WH4217>

But to the tribe <WH7626> of Levi <WH3878> Moses <WH4872> gave <WH5414> no inheritance. <WH5159> Yahweh, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> is their inheritance, <WH5159> as he spoke to them. <WH1696>
